entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @antonioguterres That’s as good as it sounds but I am wondering why we waited for COvid-19 to realize that it is but human to call and put in place measures for a ceasefire. Over 3000 and counting Ambazonians on my mind. Are we suppose to be thanking coavid-19 for shading the scales from ur eyes?
